alert.note: Alert for North Fork; Paradox Valley; Southwest Colorado Lower Forecast Area (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GrandJunction (Western Colorado and Eastern Utah)
info.headline: Fire Weather Watch issued April 20 at 2:30AM MDT until April 21 at 9:00PM MDT by NWS GrandJunction
info.description: ...FIRE WEATHER WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM THURSDAY MORNING THROUGH THURSDAY EVENING FOR GUSTY WINDS, LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITY AND DRY FUELS FOR FIRE WEATHER ZONES 207, 290, AND 292 BELOW 7000 FEET... ...FIRE WEATHER WATCH FOR THIS AFTERNOON AND EVENING HAS BEEN CANCELED... The National Weather Service in Grand Junction has canceled the Fire Weather Watch for this afternoon and evening. However, a Fire Weather Watch for Thursday afternoon and evening remains in effect for gusty winds, low relative humidity and dry fuels. * AFFECTED AREA...In Colorado, Fire Weather Zone 207 Southwest Colorado Lower Forecast Area, Fire Weather Zone 290 Paradox Valley Forecast Area and Fire Weather Zone 292 North Fork Forecast Area below 7000 feet. * WINDS...Southwest 15 to 25 mph with gusts up to 35 mph on Thursday. * RELATIVE HUMIDITY...10 to 15 percent. * IMPACTS...Conditions may become favorable for easy ignition and rapid spread of fires due to low relative humidity and strong gusty winds Thursday afternoon and evening.
info.instruction: A Fire Weather Watch means that critical fire weather conditions are forecast to occur. Listen for later forecasts and possible Red Flag Warnings.

area.areaDesc: North Fork; Paradox Valley; Southwest Colorado Lower Forecast Area
